hasColor

public java.util.ArrayList<RailCard> hasColor(int i,
                                              java.awt.Color c)
Checks to see if a colored route can be taken, and if so, takes out that many railcards from the player.

Parameters:
i - number of cards/trains needed
c - Color of the route
Returns:
arraylist of the railcards removed from the player's hand

hasFerry

public java.util.ArrayList<RailCard> hasFerry(int i,
                                              java.awt.Color c)
Checks to see if a Ferry route can be taken, and if so, takes out that many railcards from the player plus a locomotive card.

Parameters:
i - number of cards/trains needed
c - Color of the route
Returns:
arraylist of the railcards removed from the player's hand

hasGray

Takes out the card from the players hand for gray routes.

i - the number of train cards required
Returns:
The new ArrayList with required cards removed.
